overview: I couldn't find any info on this film, AT ALL. Basically, some lunatic with a penchant for fixed card tricks, tricks women into trusting him and then he drugs them and makes them do things that they dont necessarily want to do. Like get chained to the wall with a leather mask over their face, raped, and then tattooed. Wish I had more info. If anyone finds more, let me know an I'll update this.
title: The Sacrifice
